attributes.action: Allow abiraterone to be available to all men with prostrate cancer
attributes.additional_details: This drug is a available to men in Scotland and wales but not in the uk it will also save money for the nhs
attributes.background: Allow the prostrate cancer drug abiraterone to be available to all men with prostrate cancer free on the nhs

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund access to abiraterone in England for high-risk prostate cancer patients
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/722253
